UpdateChangeLog.ChangeLog:
- Added loading indicator to update checker.
- Fixed navigation not working on some computers.
- Fixed Lyric Viewer's Font selection bug.
- Fixed Tray Window UI Bug.
- Fixed mouse back button bug.
- Fixed error message.

- Improved the music downloader.
- Improved the Music Section.
- New sorry message popup.
- Fixed crashing when it couldn't find the music.
- Fixed turning completely white on selecting themes.
- Fixed saving and loading preview volume.
- Fixed starting with windows tray problem.

- Music downloder converts downloaded webm (or any file extension) to mp3.
- Added liking system.
- Added Recommandation System (Alpha Version)..
- Added a system for preventing running multiple instance of the application..
- Added confirmation to deleting a music from history..
- Fixed turning white on Windows 10 and older versions..
- Fixed preview viewer sound problem..
- Fixed the application doesn't open in hidden mode..
- Small improvements..

- Added Crash Message Box.
- Fixed crash on clicking listen button on start with Windows.

- Added language support. (You can learn more from Language Tab in Settings).
- Added Spotify Integration. (Closed Beta) (You can learn more from Spotify Tab in Settings)
- Added Auto Updater (Alpha) (Not available on 32-bit systems)
- Added button for navigating straight to the Main Menu.
- Added "Download All" to history, liked musics, recommandations and related musics.
- Added listen microphone and desktop audio buttons while viewing music.
- Added Page Transition Animation setting.
- Added native desktop notifications.
- Added Enable Mica Material setting.
- Music downloder writes metadata to the downloaded music.
- Added ability to open Spotify and Deezer.
- General improvements.
- General bugfixes.

- Added German Language (Thanks to Jonas "Jonezz25" Schnakenberg).
- Fixed language selection.

- Fixed a major bug where you can't open the MRA after updating to 0.104.1.
- Fixed MRA Crash Handler.

- Added Russian Language (Thanks to Kowalsky).
- Fixed the issue where the new users can't open MRA.
- Fixed Update checker infinite loading.

- Updated Preview UI.
- Updated navigation menu.
- New: Share the songs you found with your friends.
- New: Discord Activity System.
- New: User System.
- New: Playlist System.
- New: Create custom playlist, add music to playlists (Supporter Only)
- New: Backup your search history and liked musics (Supporter Only)
- New: Synced Lyrics Feature (Play the full music with lyrics) (Supporter Only)
- New: Transfer all musics from playlist to Spotify (Supporter Only)
- New: See the songs from same album (Supporter Only)
- New: See the Artist's page, albums and other musics (Supporter Only)
- Fixed users can't download in Russia.
- General imporvements and bug fixes

- Added song recognition from sound files.
- Added drag and drop a sound file to recognize it's music.
- Added FREE Trial version for Tier 2 Supporter Features.
- Added Spotify Music Recommendations. (Tier 3 only) (Alpha)
- Added ability to share playlist. (Tier 1 and above)
- Added the ability to see the public playlists.
- Reworked MRA Updater.
- Added font size option to Synced Lyrics.
- Added Remember Window Width&Height and Position option.
- In Preview and Synced Lyrics player controls are reworked.
- Fixed minor translation issues
- Fixed minor bugs
- Added other quality-of-life improvements.
- And much more...

- Added device switching for input and output.
- Google Account login option.
- Username and password changing for MRA accounts.
- Quick music search at startup.
- Detailed supporter feature info: mra.jadquir.com
- Enhanced artist profiles with country and biography.
- Upgraded Spotify login and recommendations.
- Compressed History and Liked History files.
- Fixed short song file recognition not working.
- Fixed Backup loading not overwriting the existing musics.
- Resolved album view issues.
- Streamlined crash report submission.
- Fixed free trial claim bug.
- UI fixes and enhancements.
- Various quality-of-life improvements.
- And much more...

Hotfix for 0.107.
- Fixed MRA not reading old history files.
- Fixed overlapping dialogs.
- Rewritten the Device Selection System (Be aware there might still be some issues).

Bugfix Update:
- Fixed bugs from crashes that are sent to the developer.
- Fixed update download cancelation freezes app.
- Fixed crashing at startup.
- Fixed MRA Updater moves the new version to "C:\\Program" folder.
- Improved Crash Report sending directly to the developer.
- Other quality of life improvements...

- Removed Auto Updater due to virus warning. You can still download it from our website and use it.
- (New) Search Music System. (Supporter Only)
- (New) Added multiple selections for music. (Right-click to a music box) (Supporter Only)
- (New) Advanced Playlist Management (multiple selection actions) (Supporter Only)
- Added Thumb Icons.
- UI Overhaul
- Added extra lyric API.
- Better eceptipn handlening.
- Fixed Spotify Integration (Invalid Client)
- Fixed bugs that are sent to the developer.
- Other quality of life improvements...

- Added hotkeys for start listening.
- Added buttons for navigating in the same playlist in music details.
- Added smooth scrolling.
- Added download to selection actions.
- Other quality of life improvements..

- Complete code revision.
- New look for the Music Details Page.
- Added Portuguese support (Thanks to Gonaah)
- Added French support (Thanks to Dylan LEFORT)

- Added "Top Searched" music (Trending) on the MRA.
- New synced lyrics feature for more accurate lyric display.
- Supporters get access to a new lyrics API.
- Introduced VIBEZ! â€“ A new way of discovering music is by scrolling.
- Now shows information for multiple artists.
- Option to remove duplicate songs from your history.
- Added search within playlists.
- New inbox for important updates and messages.
- Added Google/YouTube search on the Music Details Page (Right-click to Copy Full Name).
- Organized the Library Page with categories.
- New Playlist Information Panel with extra details.
- Added more background options.
- Fixed the issue where MRA wouldn't close properly.
- Other small bug fixes.
- Other quality of life improvements.

MRA Bugfix
- A lot of bug fixes.
